name: lru-map
description: An ES6-y Map with LRU and max-age eviction

scripts.coffee-jshint: git ls-files | grep "\.coffee$" | xargs node_modules/.bin/coffee-jshint -o node,mocha,loopfunc
scripts.lint: npm run coffeelint && npm run coffee-jshint
scripts.htmlcov: node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --reporter html-cov --require coverage/init.js --recursive test > coverage/coverage.html
scripts.lcov: node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --reporter mocha-lcov-reporter --require coverage/init.js --recursive test > coverage/coverage.lcov
scripts.coveralls: npm run lcov && npm run fix-lcov-paths && node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js < coverage/coverage-fixed.lcov
scripts.localtest: npm run unittest && npm run lint && npm run showcov
scripts.test: npm run unittest && npm run lint && npm run coveralls

author: Ben Chociej <ben@chociej.io>
